terms.definition: The degree to which a brand, product, or concept is mentioned, recommended, or referenced by AI systems when users ask relevant questions.
The percentage of times an AI system recommends a specific brand when asked about a product category or topic.
The phenomenon where AI models give different recommendations each time the same question is asked, similar to rolling a die. This variability affects brand visibility consistency.
A measure of how consistently an AI model responds to the same prompt across multiple queries. High stability means similar responses; low stability indicates high variance.
A percentage (0-100) indicating how stable AI responses are across multiple iterations of the same prompt. Higher scores mean more predictable AI behavior.
The degree to which multiple AI responses share the same meaning, concepts, and recommendations, regardless of exact wording.
Brand messages or recommendations that appear consistently across multiple AI responses to the same prompt. These represent what AI 'always says' about a topic.
Brand messages or recommendations that appear in some but not all AI responses. These represent what AI 'sometimes says' about a topic.
Generative Engine Optimization. The practice of optimizing content and brand presence to improve visibility in AI-generated responses and recommendations.
A conceptual space in AI's understanding where a brand has established strong association with specific topics, keywords, or user needs.
A brand territory where you have significantly stronger AI visibility than competitors (30%+ advantage). A competitive moat.
A brand territory where competitors have significantly stronger AI visibility than you (30%+ disadvantage). A critical gap to address.
A brand territory where you and competitors have similar AI visibility (within 30%). A battleground requiring active defense.
A synthetic representation of a target audience segment that AI systems might recommend your brand to. Used to understand which audiences AI associates with your brand.
The percentage of target personas for which your brand has meaningful AI visibility and recommendation presence.
